name: a(n) = Sum_{j = 1..n} (-1)^(n+j) * j^(2*n+4) * binomial(2*n, n-j).
comment: Compare with the identities Sum_{j = 1..n} (-1)^(n+j) * j^n * binomial(n, n-j) = n! and Sum_{j = 1..n} (-1)^(n+j) * j^(2*n+2) * binomial(2*n, n-j) = n*(n+1)*(2*n+1)/6 * (2*n)!/2 = A000330(n) * (2*n)!/2. (Campbell, Eq. 17).
link: Paolo Xausa, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
John Campbell, Applications of Gosper’s nonlocal derangement identity, Maple Transactions, 5, 1, Article 16724, Feb. 2025.
author: _Peter Bala_, Mar 30 2025
